[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=88d2b3b ]

SOLR-8750: replace anonymous inner class for callable, Runnable etc

comments.author: Steve Rowe
comments.content:
Noble, please don't commit under issues that are marked as fixed in a version that you can't commit to (i.e. previously released, or a frozen release branch pending release).

The "replace anonymous inner class for callable, Runnable etc" commit should have been done under a new JIRA.

comments.author: Noble Paul
comments.content: I thought of doing that. This was a trivial code cleanup and I thought it was an overkill to open a ticket
